duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform clinical and clerical duties within the outpatient pediatric practice setting, under the supervision of the provider and practice manager/supervisor.
Assist in the preparation and delivery of ambulatory patient care as directed by licensed clinical personnel.
Assist with the overall management of daily patient flow, including greeting patients, scheduling appointments, managing phone calls, and patient check-out procedures.
Enter patient encounters into an electronic medical record (EMR) with data entry skills.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of medical assisting or a current national MA certification. Minimum 1-year experience in outpatient pediatric practice/clinic or equivalent family practice outpatient physician practice experience. Current CPR certification required.
